sentences.en: (= do not move ) and listen to me.
sentences.cn: 站好别动，听我说。

sentences.en: Airlines should stand or fall on their ability to attract passengers.
sentences.cn: 航空公司的成败应该取决于它们吸引乘客的能力。

sentences.en: Don’t just stand there (= stand and not do anything ) – help me!
sentences.cn: 不要光站在那里，帮帮我！

sentences.en: Every two years all the congressmen stand for re-election.
sentences.cn: 所有国会议员每两年重新选举一次。

sentences.en: He can let the court's decision stand and permit the execution.
sentences.cn: 他有权维持法庭判决，批准死刑生效。

sentences.en: He doesn't stand a ghost of a chance of selling the house.
sentences.cn: 那房子他根本不可能卖得出去。

sentences.en: He has not yet announced whether he will stand in the election.
sentences.cn: 他尚未宣布自己是否会参选。

sentences.en: He lifted the bike off its stand and kick-started it.
sentences.cn: 他将摩托车撑脚架往上一提，开始蹬车启动。

sentences.en: I can’t stand bad manners.
sentences.cn: 我不能容忍没有礼貌。

sentences.en: I can’t stand people smoking around me when I’m eating.
sentences.cn: 我受不了吃饭时有人在我旁边抽烟。

sentences.en: I know he can’t stand the sight of me.
sentences.cn: 我知道他不喜欢看到我。

sentences.en: It looks like we’ll have to stand – there are no seats left.
sentences.cn: 看来我们只能站着——没有座位了。

sentences.en: It's outrageous, and we won't stand for it any more.
sentences.cn: 这太不像话了，我们再也不能容忍下去了。

sentences.en: She is to stand as a Member of the European Parliament.
sentences.cn: 她将竞选欧洲议会议员。

sentences.en: she stood her ground, refusing to let him intimidate her.
sentences.cn: 她坚持自己的立场，拒绝让他胁迫自己。

sentences.en: she stood her ground, refusing to let him intimidate her.
sentences.cn: 她坚持自己的立场，拒绝让他胁迫自己。

sentences.en: She stood in the doorway.
sentences.cn: 她站在门口。

sentences.en: She'd learnt to be herself and to stand up for her convictions.
sentences.cn: 她已经学会了按自己的方式行事，坚持自己的信仰。

sentences.en: Stand still(= do not move ) and listen to me.
sentences.cn: 站好别动，听我说。

sentences.en: Stand straight and stretch the left hand to the right foot.
sentences.cn: 站直身体,伸左手够右脚.

sentences.en: The handles stand proud of the doors of the car.
sentences.cn: 把手位于车门之外。

sentences.en: there are no merits in the Bill as it stands.
sentences.cn: 照现在这种情况来看，该提案没有什么优点。

sentences.en: There wasn't room to stand up and he had to bend double.
sentences.cn: 空间太小无法站直，他不得不弓着身子。

sentences.en: They could not stand the pace or the workload.
sentences.cn: 他们无法忍受那种节奏和工作负荷。

sentences.en: When you stand, they stand; when you sit, they sit.
sentences.cn: 你站着他们就站着，你坐下他们就坐下。

sentences.en: You have to know where to stand for a good viewpoint.
sentences.cn: 你得知道站在哪里观察角度比较理想。

words.tran_cn: 立场；姿态；位置；准备击球姿势
（戏院中或交通工具中的）站立看客；站票观众
机架；竖立的东西；煤柱；采伐残留木
站立；坚持不变；坐落于（stand的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: (史)（拦路强盗用语）站住，留下买路钱！
支持；袖手旁观；准备；站在旁边
代表；支持；象征；担任…的候选人
坚持；依靠；位于；拘泥于；[航]持续向同一方向航行
(非正式, 旧)依靠我；信任我
保持自己的尊严；坚持受到应有的礼遇；拒绝做有失身份的事
突出；站出来；坚持到底；坚决反对

phrases.phrase: stand out like a sore thumb

phrases.tran_cn: v. 站起来；坚持；竖立；站得住脚；拥护
公开表明自己的态度（或立场）

trans.tran_en: a position or opinion that you state firmly and publicly
to support yourself on your feet or be in an upright position
to support yourself on your feet or be in an upright position

trans.tran_cn: 站立，起立，竖直放置，保持看法，停滞
trans.tran_en: to support yourself on your feet or be in an upright position

trans.tran_cn: 使站立，忍受，抵御，承担责任
trans.tran_en: used to say that you do not like someone or something at all, or that you think that something is extremely unpleasant
